sentences.sContent: Clamp one end of the plank to the edge of the table.
sentences.sContent_eng: Clamp one end of the plank to the edge of the table.
sentences.sCn: 把厚木板的一端用夹具固定在桌子的边上。

sentences.sContent: Frank put the first plank down and nailed it in place.
sentences.sContent_eng: Frank put the first plank down and nailed it in place.
sentences.sCn: 弗兰克放下第一块厚木板，把它钉在合适的位置上。 。

trans.tranOther: to cover or provide (an area) with planks
a long narrow piece of wooden board, used especially for making structures to walk on
